value: Theater of Caxias, designed by Oscar Niemeyer

is a town in the state of

value: name=Nossa Senhora do Pilar Parochial Church
alt=Igreja Paroquial Nossa Senhora do Pilar
content=Constructed in 1720, the church has strong baroque features similar to constructions in Minas Gerais.
content=The oldest farm in the region, it was purchased by the São Bento monastery in 1591. On the site are the ruins of a chapel built in 1645 and a large house built in the 1750s.
address=Rua Almirante Barroso, 5/6, Duque de Caxias

content=One of the oldest samba school, it has performed in every Carnaval since at least 1923. It is the home school of many famous musicians, including Candeia, Monarco, Elis Regina, Gilberto Gil, Marisa Monte, and Zeca Pagodinho. On Wednesdays at 8PM, you can watch a rehearsal.
